Actions.Name: Squirm
Effects: Dash 2, then deal 1 piercing damage to all adjacent foes.
Up to two other Natals may deal 1 piercing damage to an adjacent foe.

Actions.Name: Void Vomit
Actions.Effects: Create a difficult terrain space adjacent to up to two natals. This space can be created under characters, and deals 1 piercing damage to a character in the space when it is created.
